title: New: Okkah – Buddha Boy Speaks Stranger
content:
Utah duo Okkah may well have just released one of the most exciting debuts of the year.

Budda Boy Speaks Stranger is self-described Symphonic Tribal Pop and to tell the truth, I’m struggling to find a more fitting genre title. Elements of Alt-J and Vampire Weekend fade in and out, particularly in the erratic, unpredictable percussion section, and deceivingly agile vocals. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
